data.comment: The big names in today's match at El Alcoraz have now been confirmed.
The match is underway in Huesca.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Levante close to the penalty box.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Huesca.
In the minute 3, Huesca's Pedro Mosquera gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Levante defender.
Can Levante get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
Throw-in for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
In the minute 5, Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Huesca just outside Levante's area.
Javier Ontiveros for Huesca gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 6, It's a goal kick for the away team in Huesca.
Throw-in for Huesca in their own half.
David Ferreiro of Huesca is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 10, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a Levante throw-in in Huesca's half.
Throw-in Levante.
Levante are caught offside.
In the minute 14, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
In the minute 15, Levante have a goal kick.
Levante to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 19, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
In Huesca a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 23, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards Levante a goal kick.
Throw-in for Huesca in the half of Levante.
Free kick for Huesca in the half of Levante.
In the minute 27, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a throw-in for Huesca, close to Levante's area.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Levante.
The ref points to the spot, it's a penalty for Huesca.
In the minute 30, Ruben Vezo is booked for the away team.
Goal! Huesca take a 1-0 lead thanks to a Javier Ontiveros spot-kick..
Levante's Mickael Malsa misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 34, Goal kick for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
Levante have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Levante in the half of Huesca.
In the minute 37, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Huesca push forward at El Alcoraz and Borja Garcia gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Levante defence.
Corner awarded to Huesca.
In the minute 39, Free kick Levante.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Rober Pier (Levante) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 42, It's a goal kick for the home team in Huesca.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Levante are pushing forward but Ruben Rochina's finish is wide of the goal.
Huesca have a goal kick.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos has blown to start the second-half.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Levante in their own half.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a Huesca throw-in in Levante's half.
In the minute 48, Corner awarded to Huesca.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
In Huesca a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 50, Huesca advance rapidly upfield but Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos blows for offside.
Levante awarded a free kick in their own half.
Huesca to take a throw-in in Levante territory.
In the minute 52, Levante have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
Corner awarded to Levante.
Goal! Gonzalo Melero equalizes to bring the score to 1-1.
In the minute 53, That's a fine assist from Rober Pier.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
Ball safe as Huesca is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 55, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Huesca in their own half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Levante at El Alcoraz.
Ruben Rochina (Levante) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Throw-in high up the field for Levante in Huesca.
In the minute 58, Dani Gomez is replacing Mickael Malsa for the away team.
Huesca drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 61, Throw-in Levante.
Free kick Levante.
Javier Ontiveros of Huesca gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 62, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards Levante a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos blows against Huesca's Borja Garcia for offside.
In the minute 65, Levante awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Can Huesca get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Levante's half?
In the minute 67, Goal kick for Levante at El Alcoraz.
Huesca have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
Corner awarded to Huesca.
In the minute 69, Free kick for Levante in their own half.
Pedro Lopez for Huesca has been booked by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos and receives a first yellow card.
The home team replace David Ferreiro with Sergio Gomez.
In the minute 71, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Levante.
Levante are coming forward and Dani Gomez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Huesca at El Alcoraz.
In the minute 73, Huesca have been awarded a corner by Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
Levante needs to be cautious. Huesca have an attacking throw-in.
Can Huesca capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Levante's half?
In the minute 75, Corner awarded to Huesca.
Huesca have a goal kick.
Levante make their second substitution with Jose Luis Morales replacing Jorge De Frutos Sebastian.
In the minute 76, Sergio Leon is on a sub for Roger Marti for Levante.
Son is replacing Coke for the away team.
The away team replace Gonzalo Melero with Nemanja Radoja.
In the minute 78, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Huesca awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Levante in their own half.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Levante in the half of Huesca.
In Huesca a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Huesca make their second substitution with Rafa Mir replacing Shinji Okazaki.
At El Alcoraz, Pablo Insua for the home team has been yellow-carded. He will miss the next match due to a suspension!
In the minute 80, Michel is making the team's third substitution at El Alcoraz with Juan Carlos replacing Borja Garcia.
Levante's Dani Gomez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 82, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards Huesca a goal kick.
Ball safe as Levante is awarded a throw-in in their half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Huesca close to the penalty box.
In the minute 84, Dimitrios Siovas (Huesca) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Ball goes out of play for a Levante goal kick.
Can Levante get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Huesca's half?
In the minute 85, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Levante in the half of Huesca.
Throw-in for Huesca in their own half.
Throw-in Huesca.
In the minute 86, Dani Escriche is on a sub for Javier Ontiveros for Huesca.
The home team have replaced Mikel Rico with Idrissa Doumbia. This is the fifth substitution made today by Michel.
In the minute 87, Throw-in for Levante close to the penalty box.
Huesca awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Levante.
In the minute 89, Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a Levante throw-in in Huesca's half.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos awards the home team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Levante.
At El Alcoraz the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos signals a free kick to Huesca in their own half.
Levante to take a throw-in in Huesca territory.
Levante are coming forward and Nemanja Radoja gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Huesca.
Huesca's Rafa Mir is whistled for offside at El Alcoraz.
Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos blows to end the match. The final score is 1-1.
Ruben Rochina (Levante) has received a yellow card from Isidro Diaz de Mera Escuderos.
